Uses of Class
menus.DrawingSurface

Packages that use DrawingSurface 
Package Description
menus  

  • Uses of DrawingSurface in menus

    Constructors in menus with parameters of type DrawingSurface 
    Constructor Description
    BattleScreen​(DrawingSurface surface, EndScreen screen)
    Constructs a screen with the given game on the provided PApplet surface
    EndScreen​(DrawingSurface surface)
    Constructs a screen with a width of 800 and a height of 600.
    MenuScreen​(DrawingSurface surface)
    Constructs a starting screen for the game with a width of 800 and a height of 600.
    RuleScreen​(DrawingSurface surface)
    Constructs a screen that contains the rules of the game.
    SelectScreen​(DrawingSurface surface, BattleScreen screen)
    Constructs a select screen with a width of 800 and a height of 600.
